title: Taylor Swift, Stray Kids, Jung Kook & More Are Finalists for Billboard Music Awards | Billboard News
description: The Billboard Music Awards are around the corner, and we have the roundup on all the finalists. From Taylor Swift to Jung Kook, keep watching to see who made it into the finals! Tetris Kelly: Billboard Music Awards time is here! We have the date of our big event along with a list of the […]
author: Katie Cao
excerpt: The Billboard Music Awards are around here, and we have the roundup on all finalists. From Taylor Swift to Jung Kook, see who made it into the finals!
text: The Billboard Music Awards are around the corner, and we have the roundup on all the finalists. From Taylor Swift to Jung Kook, keep watching to see who made it into the finals! Tetris Kelly: Billboard Music Awards time is here! We have the date of our big event along with a list of the top finalists including a battle of Kpop heavyweights all here with Billboard News. Zach Bryan leads the 2024 BBMA finalists. He is up for 18 awards. Taylor Swift, the most decorated female BBMAs artist of all time, is a finalist in 16 categories with 17 total entries. And top global Kpop artists sees a face-off between ENHYPEN, Jimin, TXT, Stray Kids, and Jung Kook. The 2024 BBMAs hosted by Michelle Buteau are set to air on Dec. 12 at 8:00 PM ET/PT. You’ll find the show on FOX and Fire TV channels, on-demand on Paramount+, with performances also rolling out across Billboard.com, and our socials. We’ll see you there!
html:
The Billboard Music Awards are around the corner, and we have the roundup on all the finalists. From Taylor Swift to Jung Kook, keep watching to see who made it into the finals!

Tetris Kelly:

Billboard Music Awards time is here! We have the date of our big event along with a list of the top finalists including a battle of Kpop heavyweights all here with Billboard News. Zach Bryan leads the 2024 BBMA finalists. He is up for 18 awards. Taylor Swift, the most decorated female BBMAs artist of all time, is a finalist in 16 categories with 17 total entries. And top global Kpop artists sees a face-off between ENHYPEN, Jimin, TXT, Stray Kids, and Jung Kook. The 2024 BBMAs hosted by Michelle Buteau are set to air on Dec. 12 at 8:00 PM ET/PT. You’ll find the show on FOX and Fire TV channels, on-demand on Paramount+, with performances also rolling out across Billboard.com, and our socials. We’ll see you there!
